name: The Last Tower
description:
The Last Tower is an Arcade tower defense infinite runner game, your job is to prevent the invading alien armies from destroying mankinds last stronghold, the goal of The Last Tower is to get the highest score possible, take it to the Steam leaderboards and show your friends who's best

Features:

Increasing difficulty
Full controller support
Bronze, Silver & Gold medals

Achievements

40 Achievements to unlock!
